name: roytang
text:
Raredraft much? https://i.imgur.com/heL77.png Those 2 mythics alone pay back this draft, and more. #mtg

[19:48] Played 3 drafts on MTGO today; the only round I lost were due to me watching Superman Returns during a crucial play =/ #mtg

[19:48] Still up around 30 tix, so it's still a good day. #mtg
